p: 75 ml of 3M H 2SO 4 was added to 1g of the pulverized sample, and the solution was carefully stirred intermittently with a magnetic stirrer for 30 min thereafter filtered using Whatman No 1 filter paper. Twenty‐five (25 ml) of the filtrate was collected and titrated while hot against 0.1 N KMnO 4 solution (0.05M KMnO 4) until a faint pink color appeared that persisted for 30 s (Chinma & Igyor, 2007; Ihekoronye & Ngoddy, 1985).
